column4: I updated my Ubuntu 11.04 to 11.10 but didn't like it. So I made clean installation of Lubuntu. Everything good but ... for example Libreoffice fonts look ugly and its navigate panel fonts are super small
basically all the fonts looks kinda different ...
hard to explain, but maybe you know how to set all the fonts too just look fine
if you want gnone2ish try xubuntu
